post.description: Sends Installation ID to DB Create, upgrades the App auth simultaneously

installationID.name: installationID
installationID.description: Installation ID for associated contributors (convert to Number).

userID.name: userID
userID.description: User ID for User or Organization (convert to Number).

repositoryID.name: repositoryID
repositoryID.description: Repository ID for Repository associated with User (convert to Number).

issueID.name: issueID
issueID.description: Issue ID for Issue associated with Repository (convert to Number).

projections.name: projections
projections.description: CSV of desired column values to return from DB query

tags.name: Installation
tags.description: Authenticates GH Scrum Poker App for associated Users. One-to-many Users.

tags.name: User
tags.description: A GitHub Contributor or Organization. Many-to-one Installation.

tags.name: Repository
tags.description: Joins Users to Issues. One-to-many Issues. Many-to-one Installation. Many-to-one User.

tags.name: App
tags.description: Octokit client which consumes GitHub REST.

tags.name: DB
tags.description: NoSQL cloud database that persists game data. CRUD.
